name: 'Toy Story 2' Quotes Online Trivia | Toy Story 2 . | 10 Questions

questions.text: It's a dangerous world out there, for a toy.
questions.explanation:
Stinky Pete.

	He said this to convince Woody to stay at Al's at least until the toy cleaner could sew his arm back on.

Andy.

	Buster doesn't respond to this. But he will perform the stunt for Woody when Woody says, 'Reach for the sky.'

Al.

	He says this to the Japanese buyer of his Roundup Gang memorabilia. This refers to an English mnemonic for the Japanese phrase meaning 'You're welcome': 'Dou itashimashite.'

questions.text: What two characters sing the song 'You've Got A Friend In Me' at different times in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Woody Wheezy & Wheezy Woody.

	Actually, Woody's TV self sings it, which convinces the real Woody that he doesn't want to leave Andy. And when Wheezy sings it at the end, he suddenly has the rich baritone voice of Robert Goulet.

Rex.

	Her sheep are playing tug-of-war with Rex over the video game remote.

questions.text: You'll like Amy. She's an artist!
questions.explanation:
Barbie.

	Amy's Barbie doll says this to Stinky Pete when they end up together in Amy's backpack. She turns to reveal her right side is covered with a wild makeup pattern.

Rex.

	He asks this when all the toys are trying to set up the scenario of Woody's kidnapping.

questions.text: I'm packing your extra pair of shoes and your angry eyes!
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Potato Head

	She places them inside of Mr. Potato Head in preparation for his rescue mission.

Hamm.

	He says this after seeing an Al's Toy Barn commercial, in which Al is dressed in a chicken suit.

Zurg.

	He said this to the new Buzz during their battle on the elevator, paralleling 'Star Wars' lore of Darth Vader and Luke Skywalker. Zurg still tries to kill him, only to be 'defeated' by Rex.
